resources.string: Could not find any log files!

string-array.name: help_messages
string-array.item: Click the \'Open logger\' button on the bottom of this activity. Then select an activity from the grid to start logging.
Once you selected an activity please put the phone upside down into your right pocket with the screen facing your leg.
This application will collect sensor data from your accelerometer. The sensor readings will be stored in a local file and can later be sent to a server.
You do not need a constant Internet connection. However, to submit the collected data you will need access to the Internet.
Switch to the \'Files\' section by clicking on the tab at the top. Before you can submit any of your files you need to provide login data for the FTP server in the settings section.

string-array.name: help_items
string-array.item: How do I have to carry my phone?
What kind of data will be collected?
Do I need an Internet connection?
How can I submit the collected data?
